nodes.description: 1995年4月19日早晨，Charlie Hanger正常巡逻 Noble County 的农村道路
nodes.support_text: Wednesday, April 19, 1995, was a cool spring morning. He woke up as usual, put on his state trooper uniform and went to work at 7 a.m. to patrol the rural roads of Noble County.

nodes.description: 接获 Oklahoma Highway Patrol 命令，前往 Oklahoma City 处理紧急事件
nodes.support_text: Then he saw the TV and noticed that one-third of the Murrah building was gone, calling it a “terrible sight.” Hanger was asked to respond, so with lights and sirens, he drove south on Interstate 35.

nodes.description: 通过电视发现 Murrah 大楼爆炸，确认三分之一的建筑被毁
nodes.support_text: Then he saw the TV and noticed that one-third of the Murrah building was gone, calling it a “terrible sight.”

nodes.description: 根据指示返回北向 I-35 高速公路，途中遇到需要帮助的两位女性
nodes.support_text: Not too far from Perry, he was told to stay in his area. He turned around and went northbound on I-35 and stopped to assist two women who had car trouble on the highway.

nodes.description: McVeigh 下车时暴露携带武器，Hanger 持枪控制并搜查车辆
nodes.support_text: Hanger didn’t approach the car. “I stood behind my door for cover as I was trained,” Hanger said, and ordered the driver out of the car. McVeigh sat sideways on the edge of the seat with his feet on the ground for a few seconds and walked towards Hanger.

nodes.description: 发现 McVeigh 携带装填 Black Talon 子弹的 Glock 手枪和自杀式枪套
nodes.support_text: Hanger told McVeigh he stopped him for no tag; McVeigh said he had just purchased the car. Hanger, who thought the car was stolen, asked for proof of insurance or a bill of sale, but McVeigh had none, so Hanger asked for his drivers license. As McVeigh reached into his right rear pocket, Hanger could see a bulge under the man’s windbreaker that looked like a weapon.

nodes.description: 查获 McVeigh 车辆登记信息异常（密歇根地址，关联共犯 Terry Nichols）
nodes.support_text: Hanger took McVeigh’s license, which had a Michigan address, and told him to use both hands to slowly unzip his jacket and pull it back. “He looks me in the eye and says, 'I have a weapon,’” Hanger said.

Upon further inquiry, Hanger learned what McVeigh meant. He had a .45 caliber Glock pistol in a suicide holster. Hanger removed McVeigh’s weapon, along with a knife and magazine he was carrying and tossed them onto the shoulder of the highway.

nodes.description: 将 McVeigh 关押至 Noble County 狱，全程未察觉其身份
nodes.support_text: Hanger nudged McVeigh with his pistol and said, “So is mine.” Upon further inquiry, Hanger learned what McVeigh meant. He had a .45 caliber Glock pistol in a suicide holster.

nodes.description: Hanger 在新闻发布会上披露逮捕过程，强调交通执法的偶然性与必然性
nodes.support_text: Hanger said this situation shows that routine traffic enforcement works. It helps with traffic safety and gives police probable cause to see what else a driver is doing. “Alert officers all over our communities and our highways are stopping these criminals by being there,” Hanger said.
McVeigh sat sideways on the edge of the seat with his feet on the ground for a few seconds and walked towards Hanger.
McVeigh sat sideways on the edge of the seat with his feet on the ground for a few seconds and walked towards Hanger.
Hanger claimed that McVeigh's hands were tightly cuffed.
Hanger loosened the handcuffs after confirming McVeigh's identity.

nodes.description: Hanger将McVeigh重新安置在安全巡逻车内
nodes.support_text: Hanger transferred McVeigh to a secure patrol vehicle.

nodes.description: McVeigh最初拒绝回答Hanger关于亲属问题的询问
nodes.support_text: McVeigh initially refused to answer Hanger's questions about his next of kin.

nodes.description: Nichols因参与1995年4月19日爆炸案被判处终身监禁
nodes.support_text: Nichols was sentenced to life in prison for his role in the Oklahoma City bombing.
Hanger询问关于McVeigh在4月19日上午10:20-10:25驾驶执照事件
Hanger逮捕McVeigh
Hanger向OHP告知逮捕McVeigh的情况
OHP询问McVeigh是否仍在狱中
McVeigh被阻止进入队列
Hanger与FBI agents交谈

nodes.description: FBI agents询问是否查看车辆
nodes.support_text: FBI agents询问是否查看车辆
FBI agents查看车辆
法院被警戒带包围

nodes.description: 确定McVeigh为Oklahoma City爆炸嫌疑人
nodes.support_text: 确定McVeigh为Oklahoma City爆炸嫌疑人
信封被密封在McVeigh的车中

nodes.description: 信封包含《Turner Diaries》摘录和爆炸蓝图
nodes.support_text: 信封包含《Turner Diaries》摘录和爆炸蓝图
McVeigh策划大楼爆炸
McVeigh拒绝携带信封入狱
信封将牵连McVeigh
Hanger获得起立鼓掌
